attributes.action: Support the building of a 50metre Swimming pool to serve the competitive and community needs of the Aberdeen area.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Aberdeen and Aberdeenshire are producing significant world class athletes in swimming disciplines and require investment in the swimming pool infrastructure to enable full development potential to be reached. The benefit of 2012 olympics should be spread across the entire nation in the form of world class sporting facilities for all to enjoy.
